function.name: securityMode-setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the security mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to change the security mode.

predefinedSecurityMode.description: The predefined security mode to set (e.g., disarmed, armed stay, armed away).

mode.description: The security mode to set (derived from predefinedSecurityMode).

course.description: The security course to set (derived from mode).
